meanings.definition: A student enrolled in a college.
meanings.sent1: The collegers gathered in the library for a study session.
meanings.sent2: The collegers enjoyed their time on campus, attending classes and social events.
meanings.sent3: The collegers decided to start a book club to make their college experience more fun.
meanings.sent4: The collegers were like a flock of birds, moving together from one class to another.
meanings.sent5: The image of collegers walking around with books in hand is a common sight on campus.

meanings.definition: A group of students attending college.
meanings.sent1: The collegers in the dormitory organized a movie night for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The collegers participated in various clubs and activities on campus.
meanings.sent3: The collegers decided to surprise their professors with a thank-you party.
meanings.sent4: The collegers formed a strong bond through their shared college experiences.
meanings.sent5: The collegers cheered loudly at the college football game, showing their school spirit.
